article_title: Ohio Muslim man sues gym he said barred him from praying
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) Mohamed Fall's lawsuit said he was accosted by gym employees while praying alone in the locker room; they told him he would be banned if he were again seen praying.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Culture, Ethics, Institutions, Cincinnati, islam, LA Fitness, lawsuit, Mohamed Fall, praying
